title: A p[i]ndarique elegie upon the death of the R.R. Father in God Jeremy, late Lord Bishop of Doune, Connor, and Dromore by Le. Mathews ...
author: Mathews, Lemuel, fl. 1661-1705.
publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,
